SELECT app.*, r.size as resources_size, r.name as resources_name, r.md5 as resources_md5, r.create_time as resources_time FROM t_app_white app LEFT JOIN t_resources r ON r.id = app.resources_id
ORDER BY app.${sortName} ${sortDir}

SELECT aw.* FROM t_app_white aw LEFT JOIN t_user_ref ur ON ur.ref_id = aw.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE ur.type = 4 AND (FIND_IN_SET(#{user}, u.pids) OR u.id = #{user}) GROUP BY aw.id
